      • arm

        public void arm(boolean arm,
                AbstractCommandListener listener)
        Arm or disarm the connected drone.
        Parameters:
        arm - true to arm, false to disarm.
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution state.

      • arm

        public void arm(boolean arm,
                boolean emergencyDisarm,
                AbstractCommandListener listener)
        Arm or disarm the connected drone.
        Parameters:
        arm - true to arm, false to disarm.
        emergencyDisarm - true to skip landing check and disarm immediately, false to disarm only if it is safe to do so.
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution state.

      • setVehicleMode

        newMode - new vehicle mode.

      • updateVehicleDataStreamRate

        public void updateVehicleDataStreamRate(int rate,
                                        AbstractCommandListener listener)
        Update the vehicle data stream rate. Note: This is ineffective for Solo vehicles since their data stream rate is handled by the onboard companion computer.
        Parameters:
        rate - The new data stream rate
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution state
        Since:
        2.9.0
